title: Fingerprint certifications (background checks)
dataVerified: Applicant name, fingerprint card number, notary certification, purpose (FBI, employment, licensing), notary name, notary commission number, notary seal, certification date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake fingerprint certifications for background checks. Domain binding verifies notary commission. FBI background checks require notarized fingerprint cards. Security clearances need authenticated fingerprint submissions. Employment screening for sensitive positions. Prevents identity fraud in criminal background checks. Critical for law enforcement where fingerprint authenticity proves applicant identity.
